dsOverview.title: ADEOS Scatterometer Winds, Level 2B

summary.p: Sea surface wind estimated by scatterometer instruments on the ADEOS satellite.
JPL PO.DAAC has initiated reprocessing of all ADEOS and QuikSCAT data with superior algorithms for retrievals in high wind speed and light rain areas. This reprocessing could affect this dataset.

creator.name: UCAR/NCAR/CISL/DSS > Data Support Section, Computational and Information Systems Laboratory, National Center for Atmospheric Research, University Corporation for Atmospheric Research

contributor.name: NASA/JPL/PODAAC > Physical Oceanography Distributed Active Archive Center, Jet Propulsion Laboratory, NASA

access.p: This dataset is subject to limited distribution. Please contact us for further information.

dsOverview.variable: EARTH SCIENCE > Oceans > Ocean Winds > Surface Winds
